sentences.sContent: India's evil caste systemremains entrenched in spite of government efforts to uproot it, a racist systemthat condemns darker skinned Indians to a life of penury and servitude.
sentences.sContent_eng: India's evil caste systemremains entrenched in spite of government efforts to uproot it, a racist systemthat condemns darker skinned Indians to a life of penury and servitude.
sentences.sCn: 尽管政府努力根除印度罪恶的等级制度，但其仍然根深蒂固，这是一个种族歧视制度，使得深色皮肤的印度人生活贫苦，受奴役。

synos.tran: 根除，连根拔起；迫使某人离开出生地或定居处

remMethod.val: up(向上) + root(根) → 使根向上， 连根拔起 → 根除
